content: **crocheted star for christmas in drops cotton merino theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no cm-117 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the piece measures approx 11 cm in diameter without loop **materials** drops cotton merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 01 off white 1 star weighs approx 12 g **crochet gauge ** 20 double crochets in width and 20 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
